title: Research Services: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: The Libraries offer a variety of services to meet the research needs of students and faculty. Librarians are available to answer your questions over the phone or online. Visit the Ask Us page to be connected with a librarian. Get more information on hours. To schedule an in-depth research consultation with an expert in your field, complete the Research Consultation Request Form. Northwestern Libraries offer all students, faculty, and staff a variety of GIS and data analysis services. For more information, visit Geospatial and Data Services.
